subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain is set to go with England to the World Cup even if he does not recover from a knee injury in time for the group stage, Coach Roy Hodgson said.
snippet: Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain is set to go with England to the World Cup even if he does not recover from a knee injury in time for the group stage, Coach Roy Hodgson said.
